quote: There are more quarrels smothered by just shutting your mouth, and holding it shut, than by all the wisdom in the world. – Henry Ward Beecher
fact: The human heart creates enough pressure when it pumps out to the body to squirt blood 30 feet.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: Can a kangaroo jump higher than the Empire State Building? Of course. The Empire State Building can't jump.
